articles.title: "Biden Is A Damp Sock Puppet In Human Form": Elon Musk Reacts To Post - NDTV
articles.description: American billionaire Elon Musk slammed US President Joe Biden after the latter left out the name of Tesla in a post that talked about the future of electric vehicles in America.
articles.content:
Back in September, Tesla CEO had said that Biden administration of being "a little biased" (File)
Washington: American billionaire Elon Musk slammed US President Joe Biden after the latter left out … [+1630 chars]
